intro: Bacularia microcarya, commonly known as the small-fruited bacularia, is a species of flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of Central Asia. Bacularia microcarya is adapted to survive in low-nutrient soils and can tolerate extreme temperature fluctuations.
